definition: to check out of a hotel room
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)

sentences.chinese: 我會告訴負責退房的人。

sentences.english: I'm checking out now. Will you send someone for my baggage, please?
sentences.chinese: 我現在要退房，請派個人來拿我的行李好嗎？

sentences.english: By the way, what's the checkout time here?
sentences.chinese: 順便問一下，什麼時間結賬退房？

sentences.english: By the way, what's the checkout time?
sentences.chinese: 順便問一下，什麼時候退房？

sentences.english: Guests are asked to vacate their room before 12:00.
sentences.chinese: 客人被要求在中午12點以前退房。

sentences.english: The passenger enters and returns a house all may complete through the simple operation.
sentences.chinese: 旅客入住和退房都可以通過簡單的操作完成。

sentences.english: When you check out, please call NO. 6849 and we'll help you with your luggage immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如果您要退房，您的行李很快就會送上去的。

sentences.english: Guests were asked to vacate their rooms before 12.00.
sentences.chinese: 客人被要求在中午12點以前退房。

sentences.english: But many of the of the new charges don't hit you until checkout.
sentences.chinese: 但許多新增收費是直到你退房時纔會發覺的。

sentences.english: I'm checking out now. How much do I owe you?
sentences.chinese: 我現在要退房，我該付你多少錢？

sentences.english: Early check-in and late check out is subject to room availability.
sentences.chinese: 過早入住登記或過晚結賬退房須視客房情況而定。

sentences.english: Is there a fine if I check out late?
Will there be any late charge?
sentences.chinese: 要不要付延遲退房的費用呢？

sentences.english: Shall I send a bellboy up to your room for collecting your luggage when you check out?
sentences.chinese: 當您退房時，我可以派一個服務生來幫您收拾行李嘛？

sentences.english: Book room individually, no organizer, clear account directly by him/herself when check-out.
sentences.chinese: 個人訂房，沒有組織者，退房時直接與酒店結算。

sentences.english: Check out the free version if you want to have a go.
sentences.chinese: 退房自由的版本，如果你想一展身手。

definition: to check in (at a hotel etc)
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
